data.title: Catherine Opie
data.meta_description: Regen Projects is a contemporary international art gallery located in Los Angeles.
data.text:
BIOGRAPHY

Born in Sandusky, OH, 1961. Lives and works in Los Angeles, CA.

Education:

B.F.A., San Francisco Art Institute, 1985 M.F.A., CalArts, 1988

Academic Positions:

2019 – present

Endowed Chair, Department of Art, University of California, Los Angeles, CA

2001 – present Professor of Photography, Department of Art, University of California, Los Angeles, CA

2000 – 2001 Professor of Fine Art, Yale University, New Haven, CT

Current Board Memberships:

Mike Kelley Foundation for the Arts Member of Board of Directors MOCA, Los Angeles Artist on the Board of Trustees The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts Member of Board of Directors
